column5: This is great if you want to be close to downtown and all the restaurants, college night life to. The home is clean and quiet for working individuals. We keep the house clean. Location is great. We have central air and heat. Wireless Internet . Everyone has a private room. We don't slam doors and quiet after 10pm so others can rest. Dishes, wash and put them away or dishwasher. Shoes off at the door. Always sponge wipe kitchen counter.
